channel.title: Going Epic
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Going Epic" - Looking for feedback...

item.title: Re: Going Epic
item.content:encoded:
Special thanks should go to Bayard, schon and Jupiah who all agreed to help out in the coordination of the attacks and went above and beyond the call to make themselves available. Extra thanks goes to naito who happened to be the one online and the first I asked to invade for the day.

Accomplishments like this one are really only possible with the help of the entire village. Our rate of growth has been phenomenal, I'm very happy with how everything's been working out.

Keep up the good work!

(I almost forgot. Bonus thanks go to Aeryes, Kage of the Void for holding 2 resources for us and letting us take them today. Celeste, Kage of Imaginary, also gets huge appreciation from me for having given us the Rotating Timespheres necessary to go Epic at all!)

item.title: Re: Going Epic
item.content:encoded:
Woot!!We are now Epic!!!

Grats Ananvil on becoming a Sannin.

item.title: Re: Going Epic
item.content:encoded:
We now have an Epic Monument. =)

I've Sannin-ized.

item.title: Re: Going Epic
item.content:encoded: I agree. Let's go epic and be an epic village. Although if we attract people to our village. That means we must leave the village temporarily to allow others to be Sannin. Nevertheless,EPIC MONUMENT FTW!!

item.title: Re: Going Epic
item.content:encoded: Sure, going Epic would probably attract people wanting to join us.

item.title: Re: Going Epic
item.content:encoded: Please do, I'm still holding my Sannin special mission.

item.title: Re: Going Epic
item.content:encoded:
Yeah are we really going to get the Epic Monument?… If yes then I don't have to leave when I attempt to become a Sannin :)
If you accept votes then I will vote for that we go Epic…

item.title: Re: Going Epic
item.content:encoded: Nothing useful unless you're trying to beat the Impossible Mission. The drops were originally supposed to be used to get a Ride to Drift Mountain, but Drift Mountain is so far from being done that the drops should just be sold.

item.title: Re: Going Epic
item.content:encoded: Yeah, it looks like we'll take down 20k monsters in 3 days atm. So my vote's for epic too. Also… what does the bloodline themes get you anyways?

item.title: Re: Going Epic
item.content:encoded: You dont loop until level 20 now for season 1 so you dont have to hold back as much :)

item.title: Re: Going Epic
item.content:encoded: Yes do go Epic! I'm currently prolonging my loop time (lvl 17 in Tai x_X) with Bingo'ing and stuff… but I want to go Sannin too! for the WhiteEye Sannin Theme :)

item.title: Re: Going Epic
item.content:encoded:
Things are a little weird right now due to the "free sannin" bit. I'm expecting our current Sannin to start looping in the next few weeks, and our current Jonin to start going for Sannin (which will be easy for a bit, since the "free sannin" bit cleared out the queue for a while). The 4 day travel time as we lost Jonin was pretty brutal :|

Truthfully, even without Hard Corps (and even without that many Sannin) we can still be killing 2 monsters a day and deal relatively easy with the 20k monsters as well.

(That, and part of the reason I was originally concerned with Hard Corps was because it'd make it easier for us to take down storm riders, so we could get Trophaeum so we could go Epic. Turns out we can kinda destroy riders right now ;) )

item.title: Re: Going Epic
item.content:encoded:
I like idea Epic Monument of but Hard Corps is better idea.

We should use sannin best we can before they loop. With Hard Corps we can have 2 low monsters easily a day and 20K HP monsters for a 3-4 days. Maybe even faster.

Epic Monument is great thing but do we need it as fast? Lets collect Monster Upgrades.

item.title: Re: Going Epic
item.content:encoded: A little more coordination is needed than that. Only 2 attacks won't get the 6 advanced resources we need. The plan is to use Rotating Timespheres for the rest of the attacks.

item.title: Re: Going Epic
item.content:encoded:
XD I see…

As soon as the riders are dead you plan to use spy reports to attack two diff villages that have both adv. resources….

No reason to not do it. If you do it before Sunday I can help.

item.title: Re: Going Epic
item.content:encoded: Not a problem with me. Let's do it.

item.title: Re: Going Epic
item.content:encoded: Darkshard: If we have the resources go for epic

item.title: Re: Going Epic
item.content:encoded: I don't object. I missed out on the freebie sannin, so this way I wont need to leave the village when my time comes.

item.title: Re: Going Epic
item.content:encoded: with all the sannin and jonin we have there is no reason for hard corps right now so go epic

item.title: Going Epic
item.content:encoded: Is there any objection to going for an Epic Monument sometime this week, putting Hard Corps on the back burner?
